data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kartonegoro, Abdulrokhman, Veldkamp, Jan Frits, Hovenkamp, Peter, Welzen, Peter van (2018): A revision of Dissochaeta (Melastomataceae, Dissochaeteae). PhytoKeys 107: 1-178, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.107.26548, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.107.26548
